sitename: The Naturopathic Integrative Medical Clinic of Santa Rosa
cleaned_text: Your Partners in Your Health Care Journey The Naturopathic Integrative Medical Clinic of Santa Rosa blends the best of Naturopathic, Functional and Western medicine for a whole-person approach. Welcome to the Naturopathic Integrative Medical Clinic of Santa Rosa NIMC blends the best of Naturopathic, Functional, and Western medicine for a "whole-person" approach. Our practitioners are your partners in your healthcare journey. They start with a holistic patient-centered model of listening to you, so they fully understand your health issues and your needs. A holistic medicine approach designed to meet your health goals.
